rules:
📜 Nuvix Setup Services – Terms of Service
By purchasing any product or service from Nuvix, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

1. No Refund Policy
All sales are final. We do not offer refunds under any circumstances.
Please ensure you fully understand the product or service before completing your purchase.
If you have any questions, contact us before buying.

2. Delivery Timeframe
Delivery and setup may take up to 5 business days, depending on:

The complexity of your order

Our current workload or queue

You will be notified once your setup is complete.
We aim to deliver high-quality, fully customized results — please be patient.

3. Chargeback Policy
Initiating a chargeback after receiving service is considered fraud and a violation of our terms.
This is a legally binding transaction.

If a chargeback is filed:

(a) Your service will be immediately revoked

(b) A dispute with evidence will be filed

(c) Legal action may be taken through PayPal’s fraud department and/or small claims court

We take fraudulent claims seriously to protect our business and community.

4. Revisions
You may request minor adjustments (e.g. channel names, role colors) within 48 hours of delivery.
Major redesigns or repeated edits may require an additional fee.

5. Your Responsibility
You are responsible for providing accurate information, including:

Discord server access

RCON credentials (if applicable)

Logos, icons, or required assets

Delays caused by missing or incorrect information are not our responsibility and do not affect the delivery timeframe.

6. Right to Refuse Service
We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order that:

Violates Discord’s Terms of Service

Involves illegal, malicious, or inappropriate content

Displays abusive or disrespectful behavior toward our team

If you have any concerns or questions, please contact Nuvix support before placing your order.

1342235198175182921.rules:
(No racist words, or extremely offensive EXPLICIT words in any chat!)
Racism + Explicit Language
(We do not Tolerate ANY constant Abuse towards admins, there's a difference from banter and unnecessary abuse!)
Attempting to bypass the word blocking bot will get you a time out!
English communication
In order to foster clear communication and ensure a respectful environment for all members, we kindly request that all conversations within the server be conducted in English. We recognize and appreciate the diversity of our community, but using a single language helps ensure that rules are followed consistently, and that all members, including staff, can understand and address any concerns or issues raised. This helps prevent misunderstandings and ensures that everyone is treated fairly.
• Threats
Threatening the server with any sort of attack will result in an Instant Ban from discord and possibly Ingame too!
• Self Promotion
You are not allowed to promote other discords. Promoting your own tiktoks, youtube, twitch ect.. is fair game.

Any Promotion of scams/illegal activity may land you an instant Permanent Ban!
‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎
⚠️ 𝗙𝗮𝗶𝗹𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘀𝗲 𝗿𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁 𝗶𝗻 𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴:
• 𝗔 𝗱𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗼𝘂𝘁
• 𝗔 𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆 𝗯𝗮𝗻
• 𝗔 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗕𝗮𝗻 𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗮𝗺𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗼𝗿𝗱 𝗕𝗮𝗻

⚠️ 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗼𝘂𝘁𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝗹𝗹 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝗮 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗕𝗮𝗻!

***
⚠️ A reminder it's up to you to stay up to date with the rules, there will always be an announcement for a rule change.
The excuse "Oh, I didn't know that rule was added" will not be accepted.
